Block.Text: {C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}And...there's something inside it. Something...unusual.{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hm? Is it something to do with this crystal? I suppose we'll just have to go there to find out...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}The {Color:32}Shrine of Resolve{Color:33} has appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I bring urgent news! This huge cave just suddenly appeared in {Area}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}A cave...?{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Yes! And there's something inside it too! Something weird! Something big!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hmm... We had better investigate.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}An {Color:32}Ancient Cave{Color:33} has appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hmm? This light... My crystal―it's...{End}
{C1}{Char:1036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:31}Tadakatsu{Color:33}, I bring ne―! But what is that light?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hmm... It's the crystal. It has begun to glow.{End}

{C1}{Char:1036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I see... I was just about to tell you that I heard a mysterious Pokémon just appeared in the {Color:32}Sky Garden{Color:33}. Maybe this is the legendary power of the crystal...{End}
{C1}{Char:1036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Legendary Pokémon are extremely powerful... This opportunity must not be passed up, Lord {Color:31}Tadakatsu{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}There is something in the {Color:32}Sky Garden{Color:33} in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1047}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I have information. A {Color:32}Mystery Rock{Color:33} has appeared in {Area}{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:1047}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Our reconnaissance team reports that there is a...mysterious presence within it... What do you wish to do, my lord?{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Interesting... I had better take a look for myself.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}A {Color:32}Mystery Rock{Color:33} has appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Th-This is incredible! A cave has appeared in {Area}{C1}! Overnight!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}What?! Even I couldn't dig a cave in a single night!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}There is a Pokémon inside it, too! One that has never been seen before!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It looks powerful... Most Warriors would not even dare to approach such a Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hmm... This sounds interesting. I shall go and investigate!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}The {Color:32}Shrine of Truth{Color:33} has appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}The crystal... It's glowing... It appears the time has come. Hehe...{End}
{C1}{Char:1049}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33}... Some sort of sky garden has suddenly appeared in {Area}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1049}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}There is also a Pokémon inhabiting it. One that no one has ever seen before.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Ha... So this is the power of the crystal... {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33} shall claim that Pokémon's power for himself!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}{Color:32}Idyllic Skies{Color:33} have appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}! I bring terrible news!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}What is it?{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}These huge ruins just suddenly appeared in {Area}{C1}! I can't work in the fields with those in the way!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What's more, there's a Pokémon there too!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}And it's no ordinary Pokémon, either! Please, you've got to come see this!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}{Color:32}Sacred Ruins{Color:33} have appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1031}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33}, you've got to listen to this! An entrance to the ancient tower in {Area}{C1} has just been found!{End}
{C1}{Char:1031}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But...none of the people who tried going in have come back out! What on earth could there be inside there?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Ha... Very interesting... {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33} shall see to this personally.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}The {Color:32}Infinite Tower{Color:33} has appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hello there! Lovely weather, isn't it? Just right for a walk, I'd say. Oh, that reminds me. I was out for a walk just a little while ago when I got lost and stumbled across an incredibly beautiful waterfall!{End}
{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I recommend you go take a look at it sometime. Erm, by the way... Would you mind telling me where I am?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Ravine{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1015}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh my... {Color:32}Elements{Color:33}?! Just lying around on the ground! I always knew that Aurora was a real treasure trove when it came to {Color:32}elements{Color:33}! Well, well... This is good news.{End}

{C1}{Char:1015}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}...Oh! I'm sorry. I've just started business as a {Color:32}Blacksmith{Color:33} over there, you see. Aurora sure is a great place, isn't it? Hey, be sure to come by sometime, all right?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Blacksmith{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I bring big news!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Huge news!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}There's something out there... Something big! I found it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You heard of the {Color:32}Sacred Ruins{Color:33}? It seems all sorts of tough Pokémon turn up there!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Sacred Ruins{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What a shock! This huge thing was just like...BOOM! And then it went BLAM! But then it just kind of floated there... What could it be...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I have no idea what you're talking about...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Floating Rock{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Well, well... I don't think this spring used to be here... My word! What's this?! I don't believe it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1000}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hm? What am I so excited about? Well, you'll just have to come here and find out, won't you, friend!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Mystery Springs{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh my, such a pleasant little {Color:32}Farm{Color:33}, and in a place like this! Unexpected finds like this are the real joy of walking. I could never give it up!{End}
{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}...By the way, you don't happen to know where I am right now, do you? I fear I may have become lost once again.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Farm{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, listen! Okay, so this is just between you and me, yeah, but I heard that there's gold in that river!{End}
{C1}{Char:1007}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}This is the chance I've been waiting for! The chance to become rich! Come on, let's go take a look!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}River of Gold{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Th-This is a-awful! A-A rock! A h-huge rock! In the s-sky! I-It just came out of n-nowhere! Wh-What on earth could it b-be?{End}
{C1}{Char:1035}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I-I want to go and s-see it, but I'm s-scared...{End}

{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! I've got some great news for you! Really great! I've managed to build a {Color:32}Power Plant{Color:33}! Pretty impressive, right? Go on, tell me how great I am! Tell me!{End}
{C1}{Char:1020}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Well, I'll be waiting for you at the {Color:32}Power Plant{Color:33}, so be sure to drop by sometime, all right? See you there! Soon!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Power Plant{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ahhh... {Color:31}Greenleaf{Color:33} is just full of natural beauty, wouldn't you say?{End}
{C1}{Char:1045}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It certainly is. It really puts a spring in your step.{End}
{C1}{Char:1036}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But what about all the Warriors and Pokémon that are always gathering in those fields over there, eh? What are they up to?{End}
{C1}{Char:1045}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}They're here for the nature and its healing powers, aren't they? Hey, what do you say we go take a look at them?{End}

{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hello there! This area is so lush and green... Perfect for taking a walk! You know, just the other day I came across a forest that was giving off this strange aura...{End}

{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Why don't you go take a look sometime? But hold on... Where am I now?! Looks like I got distracted thinking about that forest and ended up lost again...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Woodlands{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I-I simply don't believe it! A g-garden! Up there in the sky! I-It just suddenly appeared―out of thin air!{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It must be some kind of apparition... I'd better go take a look, I think!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Sky Garden{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1014}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, hello there! It's good to see you! I'm the local {Color:32}Blacksmith{Color:33} around these parts. I've just opened for business.{End}
{C1}{Char:1014}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Be sure to drop by if you need any items made! I'd be happy for the opportunity to show off my skills!{End}

{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, listen to this: I just got this new field, see, and now all these Warriors and Pokémon have turned up! I don't know if they're hungry or what, but...{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Anyway, I just wanted to let you know that if you wanted to meet new Warriors, my {Color:32}Farm{Color:33}'s the place to come!{End}

{C1}{Char:1017}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}This kingdom's really been thriving recently. All sorts of people have been coming and going! So, I thought I'd build an {Color:32}Arena{Color:33} so people could train their Pokémon. Come and check it out, when you get the chance!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Arena{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Erm... So there I was, minding my own business on my farm, right? And this rich guy turned up...{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}And said he was building a {Color:32}Park{Color:33} for Pokémon. He said that Pokémon would like nothing better!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I thought I'd better let you know as soon as possible!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Park{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1013}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Um... Excuse me... I just wanted to let you know that I've just started working here as an {Color:32}Alchemist{Color:33}. Be sure to come to me whenever you're short on items. I can combine various {Color:32}elements{Color:33} to make pretty much any item you want!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Alchemist{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, listen to this: I just found this {Color:32}Park{Color:33} over there! It seems to be full of Warriors and Pokémon, all hanging out together! I wonder what they're doing...? I really want to join them!{End}
{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You want to “hang out”?! And you call yourself a ninja...{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Urgh...{End}
{C1}{Char:1041}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh! Wh-What's that? What am I doing here? Erm...nothing! Nothing at all!{End}

{C1}{Char:1041}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I definitely haven't found an {Color:32}Open-Pit Mine{Color:33} or anything like that. And I'm definitely not trying to keep it all for myself! Not at all!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Open-Pit Mine{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1047}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I have information. A {Color:32}Snowy Mountain{Color:33} has been discovered in this kingdom. I went to investigate, and...ah-choo!{End}
{C1}{Char:1047}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It seems to be a place where...ah-choo! ...Warriors and Pokémon gather, ah-choo! Ugh... Please forgive me...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Snowy Mountain{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I did it! My {Color:32}Windmill{Color:33} is finally complete! I only hope it proves useful to you.{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You've just finished NOW?! You must be the slowest worker in this whole kingdom!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}O-Oh... I'm sorry, dear...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Windmill{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1028}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}S-Since when has this {Color:32}Snowy Mountain{Color:33} b-been here? I-I d-don't remember it being here before...{End}
{C1}{Char:1031}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What a sh-sh-shock...{End}
{C1}{Char:1028}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It's s-s-so c-c-cold here...{End}
{C1}{Char:1031}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}B-B-But everywhere else seems f-f-fine...{End}

{C1}{Char:1010}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ho ho! This area is brimming over with a mysterious power! Hm? But I can sense something even stronger coming from over there... How about we go take a look?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Power Spot{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh my! A garden floating in the sky... Whatever next? The wonders never cease for those who enjoy a spot of walking!{End}
{C1}{Char:1009}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Now then...which way did I come from? Where was I going again? Erm...where am I?{End}

{C1}{Char:1012}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ah, hello there! How are you today? I'm the resident {Color:32}Alchemist{Color:33} round these parts, and I'm now open for business. If you ever need to make any items, just bring me the {Color:32}elements{Color:33} and I'm sure I can rustle something up for you!{End}

{C1}{Char:1024}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}My word... I don't recall ever seeing a {Color:32}Park{Color:33} there before! And it was full of Pokémon, all playing happily. It was a really wonderful sight!{End}
{C1}{Char:1018}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}One, two, three! Hm? Sorry, I didn't see you there. I train Warriors and Pokémon up in the mountains.{End}
{C1}{Char:1018}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Be sure to come visit me if you need any training. I'll be sure to give you a good workout!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Hermitage{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ooh, I'm so scared...! Oh, hello there. I just came across this strange {Color:32}Cave{Color:33}, you see, so I went in to have a look around, and...it was full of all sorts of horrible things!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I'm never going there again! Not alone, anyway...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Cave{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1011}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hmm... Has this forest always been here? And I can feel some weird power, too. Why don't we go take a look?{End}

{C1}{Char:1028}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I have information to report! I found a {Color:32}Ravine{Color:33}, not too far from here. It was a wonderful place, the air was so clean, and there were trees everywhere... It seems some Warriors take their Pokémon there to relax. I recommend you pay it a visit sometime. {End}
{C1}{Char:1026}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I must admit that this tower has been troubling me for a while. What on earth is it?{End}
{C1}{Char:1025}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}According to a rumor I heard, it causes special things to happen. Things that don't happen elsewhere...{End}
{C1}{Char:1026}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Special things, eh...? It would appear that we need to investigate this tower!{End}

{C1}{Char:1025}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But...I hear that most of the time it's just an ordinary tower. Something needs to happen to trigger these “special things,” and I just don't know what it is...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Infinite Tower{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1019}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ah, hello there! I work as a guide in the {Color:32}Dragon Chamber{Color:33} over there. Be sure to bring your Pokémon along if they need a little cheering up!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Dragon Chamber{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1027}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hmm... What is that stone, I wonder. How could it possibly be floating like that...? I can't stop thinking about it...{End}
{C1}{Char:1030}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I know! It must be hanging from an invisible string!{End}
{C1}{Char:1027}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}...But what would the other end of this string be attached to?{End}
{C1}{Char:1030}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, don't be like that. It took a lot of effort to think of that idea!{End}
{C1}{Char:1027}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I'm surprised there was any thinking involved at all...{End}

{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, you there, listen to this! I found a place to do some mining! I'm going to be rich! The only problem is, all that digging makes your hands dirty. Eww! How about you do some digging for me?{End}
{C1}{Char:1008}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh! I can see that it's too much trouble for you! No, no, you don't need to say anything. If you don't want to help me, that's just fine. JUST FINE!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You are now able to visit the {Color:32}Underground Mine{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1030}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ah, perfect timing! I've actually just built a {Color:32}Park{Color:33} I intend to use for weight training! I hope that plenty of Pokémon and Warriors come along and use it. Maybe I'll see you there one day as well!{End}
{C1}{Char:1054}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}...Eh? I don't remember this spring being here before! Oh! L-Look at this! Look!{End}
{C1}{Char:1054}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hmm? You want to know what I was so surprised about just now? Well, you'll just have to come here and find out, won't you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I have big news! A rare Pokémon has been spotted in the {Color:32}Park{Color:33} in {Area}{C1}! Why don't we go take a look?{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Hey! Listen to this! This super-rare Pokémon has been seen in the {Color:32}Park{Color:33} in {Area}{C1}! Let's go and say hello!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I heard there's this really rare Pokémon in the {Color:32}Park{Color:33} in {Area}{C1}. How about we go take a look?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}There seems to be an interesting creature in the {Color:32}Park{Color:33} in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}! This is terrible! |02,51,64{C1}'s army has invaded {Area}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Wh-What are we going to do?!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}! An elderly gentleman has requested an audience with you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hello there, youngster. I don't think we've met before. I've been researching Pokémon here in {Color:32}Ransei{Color:33} for a very long time now.{End}

{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}But it's about time that I thought about retiring. Before I do that, though, I thought I'd better share some of what I've learned with you young Warriors.{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Stats.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Move ranks.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Nothing for the moment.{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}If there's anything you want to ask about, youngster, go ahead. This old man has plenty of time on his hands.{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What do you want to know about?{End}
{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh really? Righto. Just keep working hard, youngster, and your Pokémon are bound to get stronger.{End}

{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Pokémon have the following {Color:32}stats{Color:33}: {Color:32}Attack{Color:33}, {Color:32}Defense{Color:33}, and {Color:32}Speed{Color:33}. Improving a Pokémon's {Color:32}Attack{Color:33} means they cause more damage to enemies. Improving a Pokémon's {Color:32}Defense{Color:33} means they receive less damage from enemies.{End}

{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Finally, improving a Pokémon's {Color:32}Speed{Color:33} makes it easier for their moves to hit the enemy while also making it easier for them to avoid enemy moves. Got all that?{End}

{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Now, all Pokémon moves have {Color:32}move ranks{Color:33}. Increasing this rank makes moves more powerful and makes it easier to achieve bonus effects after performing a move. Look at the number next to a move to see its {Color:32}move rank{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:1055}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}To increase a {Color:32}move rank{Color:33} to its maximum level, you will need to achieve a 100% {Color:32}link{Color:33} with your Pokémon. Moves whose {Color:32}move ranks{Color:33} are at their maximum level are super powerful, so be sure to work hard and strengthen your {Color:32}link{Color:33}, all right?{End}
